p: Hyssop, Hyssopus officinalis L. (Lamiaceae), is a shrubby perennial herbaceous plant, distributed mostly in the Mediterranean area [ 1, 2, 3]. In Montenegro and Serbia, Hyssopus officinalis L. subsp. aristatus (Godr.) Nyman (syn. H. officinalis L. subsp. pilifer (Gris. ex Pant.) Murb.) can be found in plant communities of rocky pastures [ 2].
